TopicTitle: Where do I get the kethane mod?

Articles.Content:
I went to the spaceport and did not see it on the front page, so I searched it in the search bar, but all it showed me were these user submitted craft using the mod and not the mod itself.

Edited June 21, 2013 by WhiteWeasel
Forum search bar, type in kethane, click search, first result. Did you really not try it before deciding to post a thread about it?
I thought the mods were posted in the space port?

I thought the mods were posted in the space port?

Through miracles of magic the developers of most mods post their creations on the forums, which they know more people visit than randomly find their mod on the spaceport. Amazing, but true! Not only that, but searching the forums may result in finding threads previously asking the same question, tutorials or other threads discussing the mod you're after. Also amazing, I know!

Always worth a try to use the search function before asking, you never know if you're treated to a magic miracle of amazingness.

Through miracles of magic the developers of most mods post their creations on the forums, which they know more people visit than randomly find their mod on the spaceport. Amazing, but true! Not only that, but searching the forums may result in finding threads previously asking the same question, tutorials or other threads discussing the mod you're after. Also amazing, I know!

Always worth a try to use the search function before asking, you never know if you're treated to a magic miracle of amazingness.

So that's why there was this old thread ripping on the spaceport for being a mess.

You can use the search function for the forum, but it usually works better to just use google. It sends you to the spaceport if there's a file there, or the forum if it's here, or more likely, to both within the top 4 or 5 hits.

But if you just want to look for mods go the addon release, or the addon development sub-forum. The information there is almost always more up to date than the spaceport. And you can find a lot more details about the mods there, too.
